segments.text: What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a little embarrassing really ; you see I think I've got a counterfeit note .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you remember where you got it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don't . Usually I'm very careful about checking the money I'm given , but for some reason this one slipped through .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Counterfeit notes these days can be very sophisticated and difficult to spot with the naked eye . But I must warn you that if it does show to be a counterfeit I have no option but to confiscate it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand . To be honest , I'll be glad to get rid of it if it is a fake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The machine shows it to be counterfeit . You'll need to fill in this form and I'll give you a receipt to show the money has been confiscated .
segments.speaker: S1
